items.headline: Verizon’s outage may have annoyed users, but it didn’t bother investors
items.summary_en: Verizon’s stock rose Wednesday, despite reports of widespread outages of the company’s wireless service.

items.headline: Saks files for bankruptcy. These big fashion brands — and tech names — are waiting to get paid.
